content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”22px” header_2_font=”|||on|||||”]

Get in Touch

This is our all-purpose contact form, for anyone interested in reaching out to Family Promise. Are you a family with children experiencing homelessness? We do not provide services here at the National office–our 200+ Affiliates nationwide do that. You can access the website and contact information for the Affiliate nearest your location by clicking the “Need Help?” link at the top of this page. If you would prefer to contact the National office, please fill out the entire form below.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

CONTACT US

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

  • Thank you for your submission!

    Your message has been sent to the appropriate department. We will review your submission and respond as soon as we can.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false”]

FAQ

Before contacting us, maybe we’ve already answered your question. Here are a few common questions and answers.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”e2706452-e80d-40e5-9995-92bf7a295f77″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ locked=”off”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is Family Promise a homeless shelter?” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ open=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″]Yes…and so much more.

We began thirty years ago as the Interfaith Hospitality Network and our core program was shelter. But over the years, as we have added new Affiliates, and existing Affiliates matured, we have continued developing a broad array of programs to serve low-income families and families experiencing homelessness. In 2003, we changed our name to Family Promise, more reflective of our ever-broadening scope. The name speaks to the promise we make to every family we serve, but also to the promise that is inherent in every family.

Our model comprises prevention & diversion initiatives for families who are at risk of experiencing homelessness; food, shelter, and case management for those who are experiencing homelessness; and stabilization programs to ensure that the independence of the families who have secured housing after leaving the program is sustainable.

Today, we are the leading national organization addressing family homelessness.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How can I volunteer?” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Volunteers play an essential role in helping families experiencing homelessness attain sustainable independence. Each year, 200,000 compassionate volunteers help Family Promise serve more than 100,000 children and adults.

Click here to get started on the path of volunteering. There you’ll be able to indicate your preferred location(s) and volunteer activities. After that, you will be connected to an Affiliate that matches your interests and provided additional details.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Do you only serve the homeless population?” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]In our shelters, by definition, those we serve are experiencing homelessness. However, since our work also focuses on the prevention of homelessness, and the stabilization of people at risk or who have experienced homelessness, many of the people we serve would not be defined as homeless at the time at which we serve them. That is the point—if you treat homelessness as a spectrum and can support families and individuals before and after they experience homelessness, you can effect permanent change.[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_padding=”|||4px|false|false”]

Or read our full FAQ.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” color=”#8D4881″ custom_padding=”80px||0px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” min_height=”0px” height=”16px”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ custom_padding=”||22px|4px|false|false” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Family Promise

71 Summit Ave.,
Summit, NJ 07901

(908) 273-1100

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/DSC_1430-1024×944-1.jpeg” title_text=”DSC_1430-1024×944″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px|||||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding=”50px||30px|||” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#472D5B”]

Find Your Affiliate

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_padding=”0px||26px|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ specialty_columns=”2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||28px|||”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#8D4881″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”85%” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px”]

Enter your zip code or address to find the Family Promise Affiliates in your area.


[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”85%” button_text=”Learn More About Our Affiliates” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”hover-darken” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF”     October 24 - October 31
